item.title: Pyminion
item.description: Dominion game engine, simulator and AI builder written in Python

About I’m currently a software engineer at Wasabi working on cloud object storage. Previously I’ve worked at Sensata, Solchroma and Precision Nanosystems. I graduated from Tufts University in 2021 with a degree in mechanical engineering, where I focused on mechatronics, robotics and product design. In my free time I can be found tinkering with virtual machines and networks in my homelab, taking pictures with my Nikon FM2 and struggling to make par on the golf course.
